title: Criticism of Psychiatry and  Psychoanalysis - Collection 9
description:
Criticism of Psychiatry and  Psychoanalysis - Collection 9:

We have 35 titles here:

-  Abramson (Ed.) - The Use of LSD in Psychotherapy and Alcoholism (1967)

-  Banyard - Controversies in Psychology (1999)

-  Barratt - What Is Psychoanalysis; 100 Years after Freud's 'Secret Committee' (2013)

-  Billing - The Hidden Roots of Critical Psychology (2008)

-  Clifford - Freud's Converts (2007)

-  Deutsch (Ed.) - Traumatic Ruptures; Abandonment and Betrayal in the Analytic Relationship (2014)

-  Dobransky - Managing Madness in the Community; the Challenges of Contemporary Mental Health Care (2014)

-  Fonagy et al (Eds.) - Identity, Gender, and Sexuality; 150 Years after Freud (2006)

-  Frisch et al (Eds.) - Psychoanalysis and Psychotherapy; the Controversies and the Future (2001)

-  Gerrard - The Impossibility of Knowing; Dilemmas of a Psychotherapists (2011)

-  Gerson (Ed.) - The Therapist as a Person; Life Crises, Life Choices, Life Experiences, and Their Effects on Treatment (2001)

-  Gray - The Acid Diaries; a Psychonaut's Guide to the History and Use of LSD (2010)

-  Haute & Geyskens - A Non-Oedipal Psychoanalysis; a Clinical Anthropology of Hysteria in the Works of Freud and Lacan (2012)

-  Holdstrock - Re-examining Psychology; Critical Perspectives and African Insights (2000)

-  Kapardis - Psychology and Law; a Critical Introduction, 3e (2010)

-  Kernberg - Psychoanalytic Education at the Crossroads; Reformation, Change and the Future of Psychoanalytic Training (2016)

-  Kinderman - A Prescription for Psychiatry; Why We Need a Whole Approach to Mental Health and Wellbeing (2014)

-  Laurent - Lost in Cognition; Psychoanalysis and the Cognitive Sciences (2014)

-  McGowan - Enjoying What We Don't Have; the Political Project of Psychoanalysis (2013)

-  Mitchell & Black - Freud and Beyond; a History of Modern Psychoanalysis Thought (2016)

-  Moncrieff - The Myth of the Chemical Cure; a Critique of Psychiatric Drug Treatment (2008)

-  Pandora - Rebels within the Ranks; Psychologists' Critique of Scientific Authority and Democratic Realities in New Deal America (1997)

-  Parker - Critical Discursive Psychology, 2e (2015)

-  Parker - Psychoanalytic Mythologies (2009)

-  Parker - Revolution In Psychology; Alienation to Emancipation (2007)

-  Royce & Mos (Eds.) - Humanistic Psychology; Concepts and Criticisms (1981)

-  Sanders - Post-Kleinian Psychoanalysis; the Biella Seminars (2001)

-  Symington - The Blind Man Sees; Freud's Awakening and Other Essays (2004)

-  Szasz - A Lexicon of Lunacy, Metaphoric Malady, Moral Responsibility and Psychiatry (1993)

-  Szasz - Law, Liberty and Psychiatry; An Inquiry into the Social Uses of Mental Health Practices (1963)

-  Szasz - The Medicalization of Everyday Life; Selected Essays (2007)

-  Vandermeersch - Unresolved Questions in the Freud-Jung Debate on Psychosis, Sexual Identity and Religion (1991)

-  Vollm & Nedopil (Eds.) - The Use of Coercive Measures in Forensic Psychiatric Care; Legal, Ethical and Practical Challenges (2016)

-  Walkerdine (Ed.) - Challenging Subjects; Critical Psychology for a New Millennium (2002)

-  Withers (Ed.) - Controversies in Analytical Psychology (2003)
